Package info.kwarc.krextor

Interface Summary
TripleAdder An interface that must be implemented in order to get notified about all RDF triples that Krextor extracts from an XML document
 

Class Summary
Krextor A Java wrapper for the Krextor XMLâ†’RDF extraction library, which is implemented in XSLT.
RelativePathResolver This is a custom URI resolver for relative paths.
 

Exception Summary
KrextorException Any exception that can occur in the case of initializing or running Krextor
